subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Cycling’s governing body lashed out at France’s antidoping agency for alleging that the Astana team received preferential treatment during drug tests at this year’s Tour de France.
snippet: Cycling’s governing body lashed out at France’s antidoping agency for alleging that the Astana team received preferential treatment during drug tests at this year’s Tour de France.
